data.actual_result: Box saying that your Nitro will expire in next month
data.expected_result: Box shownig that you nitro already expired
data.short_description: If you delayed payment for Discord Nitro, the cancellation of Nitro will tell you that your Nitro will end on the next payment date
data.steps_to_repro: - Buy Discord Nitro - Wait until next payment date - Do not pay for nitro at this day - Try to cancel Nitro the next day
